name: core_arch::x86::avx512fp16::_mm256_cvtsh_h

intrinsics::simd::simd_extract.doc:
Extracts an element from a vector.

 `T` must be a vector with element type `U`, and `idx` must be `const`.

 # Safety

 `idx` must be const and in-bounds of the vector.

doc:
Copy the lower half-precision (16-bit) floating-point element from `a` to `dst`.

 [Intel's documentation](https://software.intel.com/sites/landingpage/IntrinsicsGuide/#text=_mm256_cvtsh_h)
